scripts.build: nest build && copyfiles -u 1 src/proto/**/*.proto dist/  && copyfiles -u 1 src/proto/**/*.proto dist/grpc
scripts.generate:proto: npm run generate:nutrition-proto && npm run generate:food-recognition-proto && npm run generate:meal-management-proto && npm run generate:water-tracker-proto && npm run generate:exercise-proto
scripts.generate:proto:linux: mkdir -p src/generated && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,outputServices=grpc-js,returnObservable=false --proto_path=src/proto src/proto/nutrition.proto && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,outputServices=grpc-js,returnObservable=false --proto_path=src/proto src/proto/food-recognition.proto && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,outputServices=grpc-js,returnObservable=false --proto_path=src/proto src/proto/meal-management.proto && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,outputServices=grpc-js,returnObservable=false --proto_path=src/proto src/proto/water-tracking.proto && protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-ts_proto=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=src/generated --ts_proto_opt=nestJs=true,outputServices=grpc-js,returnObservable=false --proto_path=src/proto src/proto/exercise.proto
scripts.build:linux: npm run generate:proto:linux && npx nest build && copyfiles -u 1 src/proto/**/*.proto dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/proto/**/*.proto dist/grpc
